title: T209-2, T213 Type 2 and T215 Type 2 For Trade/Sale

posts.post_title: T209-2, T213 Type 2 and T215 Type 2 For Trade/Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jay
I have three cards for trade or sale: A nice T209-2 Gillespie Rocky Mt, a nice T213 Type 2 Doolan (Baltimore Fed.) and a T215 Type 2 Tinker extremely minor paper loss in the front margin and some paper loss on the back. The Tinker presents very well. Scans available by sending me an email at oldjudge@gmail.com

Thanks---Jay
